services.name: Electronic Health Record (EHR)
services.description: A digital system for storing and managing patient health records securely.

services.name: Medical Imaging
services.description: Tools and infrastructure for storing, viewing, and analyzing medical images such as X-rays, MRI scans, and CT scans.

services.name: Health Monitoring
services.description: Remote monitoring of vital signs and health data, such as heart rate, blood pressure, and sleep patterns.

services.name: Telemedicine
services.description: Remote consultations between healthcare providers and patients through video calls or chat platforms.

services.name: Prescription Management
services.description: Management and tracking of prescription medications, including ordering refills, receiving reminders, and reviewing medication instructions.

services.name: Laboratory Information System (LIS)
services.description: Management and tracking of laboratory tests, including specimen tracking, test results, and data analysis.

services.name: Health Analytics
services.description: Data analytics techniques to extract insights from health data, enabling population health management and research.

services.name: Appointment Scheduling
services.description: Scheduling appointments with healthcare providers, viewing availability, and receiving appointment reminders.

services.name: Health Education
services.description: Providing educational resources and information on various health topics for informed decision-making.

services.name: Medication Reminder
services.description: Automated reminders for medication intake, dosage instructions, and refill notifications.

services.name: Chronic Disease Management
services.description: Tools and resources to help manage chronic conditions such as diabetes, asthma, or hypertension.

services.name: Health and Wellness Tracking
services.description: Tracking exercise, nutrition, sleep patterns, and other wellness-related activities for personal health management.
